title: New Champion! Ivern, Friend of the Forest

embed.description: WORK IN PROGRESS ] A new video teaser has been released for our next champion, Ivern! Check out: Ivern: Friend of the Forest Continue reading for more information! From the official LoL FB: "Ivern: Friend of the Forest" Ivern's pre-reveal in-game teaser went live in 6.18 as the mysterious voice teasers!

body:
What are your thoughts guys?
I'm looking forward to seeing his abilities, I have a feeling he can grow brushes or something, I dunno
I'm just curious for how he's gonna be different to Maokai, probably with more jungle control somehow

replies.body:
If you get those dogs from the splash art in the client, then I'm maining him.

Nevermind, they were the wolves... nice, Riot.

the guy looks like Maokai.

You're definitely on the right track. He seems to be like an old school roaming support jungler of some type.

**Riot Ghostcrawler** has also been dropping us a few [hints](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/52fxo1/ama_league_design_lead_greg_ghostcrawler_street/d7jymve) ;)
